description: '''SM Rookies''' ({{korean|에스엠루키즈}}, stylized in all caps as '''SMROOKIES''') is a pre-debut training team created by South Korean entertainment agency [[SM Entertainment]] in 2013, composed of trainees who have yet to join an [[Korean Idol|idol]] group. From 2013 to 2023, the team officially introduced 35 members, of which 30 debuted under SM Entertainment as part of [[Red Velvet (group)|Red Velvet]], [[NCT (group)|NCT]], [[Aespa]], [[Riize]], and Mytro, with rookie Lami debuting as an actress. Since 2024, the team has had no active members.
